leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 科研知识图谱-实体规范化与证据链生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 抽取→对齐→融合→推理→版本→评测

tools.name: GraphRAG Agent
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated agent framework for Knowledge Graph construction and RAG-based reasoning
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive framework integrating GraphRAG, LightRAG, and Neo4j-llm-graph-builder to facilitate knowledge graph construction and search. It incorporates DeepSearch technology for private RAG reasoning and includes a custom evaluation framework, serving as an infrastructure tool for scientific knowledge management and evidence chain reasoning.

tools.name: AmpliGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Library for representation learning on knowledge graphs
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for representation learning on knowledge graphs (KGE). It provides implementations of various embedding models (TransE, ComplEx, etc.) and is widely used for link prediction tasks in scientific domains such as drug discovery and biological network analysis.

tools.name: GRAPE
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance graph representation learning library for biological and general graphs
tools.detailed_description: A Rust/Python library optimized for graph representation learning, specifically designed to handle large-scale graphs efficiently. It is developed by a bioinformatics lab and is suitable for predictions and evaluations on biological networks (e.g., PPI) and other scientific graphs.

tools.name: Kelpie
tools.one_line_profile: Explainability framework for knowledge graph link prediction
tools.detailed_description: An XAI (Explainable AI) framework dedicated to interpreting link predictions on knowledge graphs. It helps researchers understand the reasoning behind predicted relationships, which is critical for evidence chains in scientific discovery (e.g., drug-disease associations).

tools.name: OpenHGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for Heterogeneous Graph Neural Networks based on DGL
tools.detailed_description: An open-source toolkit built on DGL specifically for Heterogeneous Graph Neural Networks (HGNNs). It provides a unified interface for running various HGNN models, which are essential for modeling complex scientific entities (e.g., drugs, proteins, diseases) and their diverse relationships.

tools.name: tf_geometric
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Network library for TensorFlow
tools.detailed_description: An efficient and user-friendly Graph Neural Network (GNN) library designed for TensorFlow 1.x and 2.x. It provides essential building blocks for graph deep learning, enabling the development of models for scientific graph data (e.g., molecular graphs).

tools.name: entity2vec
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for generating property-specific entity embeddings from KGs
tools.detailed_description: A tool that generates property-specific entity embeddings from knowledge graphs using node2vec. It allows for the creation of vector representations of entities based on specific properties, which can be used for downstream scientific tasks like similarity analysis or link prediction.

tools.name: STSGCN
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial-Temporal Synchronous Graph Convolutional Networks for forecasting
tools.detailed_description: A framework for spatial-temporal network data forecasting, specifically designed to capture localized spatial-temporal correlations in traffic and other network data.

tools.name: ULTRA
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation model for knowledge graph reasoning
tools.detailed_description: A foundation model designed for knowledge graph reasoning that generalizes to new graphs without retraining, supporting inductive inference on arbitrary entity and relation sets.

tools.name: GraphVite
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance graph embedding system
tools.detailed_description: A general and high-performance graph embedding system that supports large-scale knowledge graph embedding and node embedding, optimized for speed and scalability on CPUs and GPUs.

tools.name: PDE Dataset Generator
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for generating PDE ground truth datasets
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool for generating Partial Differential Equations (PDEs) ground truth datasets using solvers like ARCSim, FEniCS, and SU2, facilitating machine learning for physics simulations.

tools.name: GraphGallery
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking framework for Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A gallery and benchmarking framework for Graph Neural Networks (GNNs), providing unified interfaces for implementing and evaluating various GNN models on standard datasets.

tools.name: GreatX
tools.one_line_profile: Graph reliability toolbox based on PyTorch Geometric
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox focused on graph reliability, including robustness, defense, and uncertainty estimation for Graph Neural Networks, built upon PyTorch Geometric.

tools.name: STGCN-PyTorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of Spatio-Temporal Graph Convolutional Networks
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the Spatio-Temporal Graph Convolutional Network (STGCN) for solving time-series prediction problems on graphs, such as traffic forecasting.

tools.name: Think-on-Graph (ToG)
tools.one_line_profile: Deep and responsible reasoning of LLM on Knowledge Graph
tools.detailed_description: A framework that enables Large Language Models (LLMs) to perform deep reasoning on Knowledge Graphs by iteratively exploring and reasoning over graph structures.

tools.name: GraphSAINT
tools.one_line_profile: Graph sampling based inductive learning method
tools.detailed_description: A graph sampling-based inductive learning method that enables fast and accurate minibatch training for deep Graph Neural Networks on large graphs.

tools.name: Neural Fingerprint
tools.one_line_profile: Convolutional networks for molecular graphs
tools.detailed_description: A library for creating differentiable fingerprints for molecules using graph convolutional neural networks, enabling prediction of molecular properties.

tools.name: 3DInfomax
tools.one_line_profile: Self-supervised learning on molecules using 3D geometry
tools.detailed_description: A framework for pre-training Graph Neural Networks on molecular graphs by maximizing mutual information between 2D and 3D representations, improving molecular property prediction.

tools.name: KGEmb
tools.one_line_profile: Hyperbolic Knowledge Graph Embeddings library
tools.detailed_description: A library for learning Knowledge Graph embeddings in hyperbolic space, which is particularly effective for capturing hierarchical structures in KGs.

tools.name: HGCN
tools.one_line_profile: Hyperbolic Graph Convolutional Networks library
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Hyperbolic Graph Convolutional Networks (HGCN), designed to learn embeddings for scale-free or hierarchical graphs.

tools.name: BrainGB
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for Geometric Deep Learning in Brain Network Analysis
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark and toolbox for applying Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) to brain network analysis, facilitating the study of brain connectivity and disease prediction.

tools.name: EvolveGCN
tools.one_line_profile: Evolving Graph Convolutional Networks for dynamic graph representation learning
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of EvolveGCN, a method that adapts the graph convolutional network (GCN) model along the temporal dimension to capture the dynamics of evolving graphs. It is useful for modeling dynamic systems in scientific networks.

tools.name: LNN
tools.one_line_profile: Neuro-symbolic framework for weighted real-value logic
tools.detailed_description: Logical Neural Networks (LNN) is a framework that combines neural networks with symbolic logic, allowing for sound and complete weighted real-value logic reasoning. It is applicable to knowledge graph reasoning and scientific inference.

tools.name: torchlogic
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch framework for Neuro-Symbolic AI and Neural Reasoning Networks
tools.detailed_description: A framework built on PyTorch for developing Neuro-Symbolic AI systems, specifically implementing Neural Reasoning Networks. It facilitates the integration of logical reasoning into deep learning models.

tools.name: KagNet
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge-Aware Graph Networks for commonsense reasoning
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of KagNet, a model that performs commonsense reasoning by grounding questions and answers in a knowledge graph and modeling the relational paths using GNNs.

tools.name: RE-Net
tools.one_line_profile: Recurrent Event Network for temporal knowledge graph reasoning
tools.detailed_description: A model for autoregressive structure inference over temporal knowledge graphs, capable of predicting future events based on historical graph structures.

tools.name: KGEmbedding-OTE
tools.one_line_profile: Orthogonal Relation Transforms for Knowledge Graph Embedding
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the OTE (Orthogonal Relation Transforms) method for knowledge graph embedding, which models relations as orthogonal transforms to better capture symmetry, antisymmetry, and inversion patterns.

tools.name: PPT
tools.one_line_profile: Prompt-based Pre-trained Language Model for Temporal KG Completion
tools.detailed_description: A framework utilizing pre-trained language models with prompts to perform completion tasks on temporal knowledge graphs, enhancing reasoning capabilities over time-evolving data.

tools.name: HAN
tools.one_line_profile: Heterogeneous Graph Neural Network
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Heterogeneous Graph Attention Network (HAN), designed to handle heterogeneous graphs with multiple types of nodes and edges, widely used in analyzing complex scientific networks.

tools.name: Representation-Learning-on-Heterogeneous-Graph
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of representation learning methods for heterogeneous graphs
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing implementations and benchmarks for various representation learning methods on heterogeneous graphs, serving as a resource for comparative analysis in graph research.

tools.name: TeMP
tools.one_line_profile: Temporal Message Passing Network for Temporal KG Completion
tools.detailed_description: A temporal message passing network designed for completing missing links in temporal knowledge graphs by effectively aggregating structural and temporal information.

tools.name: FAAN
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive Attentional Network for Few-Shot KG Completion
tools.detailed_description: Code for the Adaptive Attentional Network, a method for few-shot knowledge graph completion that adapts to new relations with limited examples.

tools.name: P-GNN
tools.one_line_profile: Position-aware Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Position-aware Graph Neural Networks (P-GNNs), which capture the position of nodes with respect to anchor sets, useful for tasks requiring structural position awareness in graphs.

tools.name: GEN
tools.one_line_profile: Transductive Few-shot Out-of-Graph Link Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A framework for learning to extrapolate knowledge in transductive few-shot settings, specifically for out-of-graph link prediction tasks.

tools.name: RGCN
tools.one_line_profile: Relational Graph Convolutional Networks implementation
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Relational Graph Convolutional Networks (R-GCN), a standard model for handling multi-relational data in knowledge graphs.

tools.name: Metatheory.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Symbolic computation and algebraic equational reasoning library for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A library for general-purpose metaprogramming and symbolic computation in Julia, featuring E-Graphs and equality saturation for algebraic reasoning and term rewriting, highly relevant for scientific equation discovery and simplification.

tools.name: JOIE
tools.one_line_profile: Jointly Embedding Instances and Ontological Concepts
tools.detailed_description: Code for the JOIE model, which learns universal representations of knowledge bases by jointly embedding instances and ontological concepts, facilitating hierarchy-aware knowledge reasoning.

tools.name: pytorch-direct_dgl
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-Oriented Data Communication Architecture for Large GNN Training
tools.detailed_description: A system optimization tool for training large-scale Graph Convolutional Networks (GCNs) using a GPU-oriented data communication architecture, enabling efficient processing of massive scientific graphs.

tools.name: AIToolbox
tools.one_line_profile: AI modules toolbox written in Swift
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolbox of AI algorithms implemented in Swift, including graphs, neural networks, SVMs, and genetic algorithms, suitable for scientific data analysis and modeling on Swift-supported platforms.

tools.name: Neural-Temporal-Walks
tools.one_line_profile: Motif-Aware Representation Learning on Continuous-Time Dynamic Graphs
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Neural Temporal Walks, a method for learning representations on continuous-time dynamic graphs by leveraging temporal motifs, useful for analyzing dynamic scientific networks.

tools.name: tensorlogic
tools.one_line_profile: Unified programming language for AI combining neural and symbolic reasoning
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of Tensor Logic, a framework that unifies neural and symbolic reasoning through tensor equations, enabling the development of neuro-symbolic AI models.

tools.name: OpenTLP
tools.one_line_profile: Unified Framework for Temporal Link Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A unified framework and taxonomy for temporal link prediction, providing implementations of various dynamic link prediction methods and resources for benchmarking.

tools.name: PeSTo
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning for protein binding interface prediction
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning method designed to predict protein binding interfaces directly from protein structures, aiding in the understanding of protein interactions.

tools.name: TransE-Knowledge-Graph-Embedding
tools.one_line_profile: TensorFlow implementation of TransE for Knowledge Representation Learning
tools.detailed_description: A TensorFlow implementation of the TransE model and its extensions for knowledge graph embedding, a fundamental method for representing entities and relations in vector space.

tools.name: RE-GCN
tools.one_line_profile: Evolutional Representation Learning for Temporal KG Reasoning
tools.detailed_description: Code for RE-GCN, a model that performs temporal knowledge graph reasoning by learning evolutional representations of entities and relations over time.

tools.name: DRL-GNN-Routing
tools.one_line_profile: Residual edge-graph attention neural network for routing problems
tools.detailed_description: A Deep Reinforcement Learning and Graph Neural Network based solver for routing problems (e.g., TSP, VRP), applying scientific optimization techniques to combinatorial problems.

tools.name: AGCRN
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive Graph Convolutional Recurrent Network
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of AGCRN, a model that captures node-specific patterns and infers inter-dependencies in multivariate time-series data through adaptive graph convolution, applicable to scientific structure inference and forecasting.

tools.name: GCN4KGC
tools.one_line_profile: Rethinking Graph Convolutional Networks in Knowledge Graph Completion
tools.detailed_description: Code for the paper 'Rethinking Graph Convolutional Networks in Knowledge Graph Completion', providing optimized GCN implementations for KG completion tasks.

tools.name: KG-TACT
tools.one_line_profile: Topology-aware correlation modeling for inductive link prediction in knowledge graphs
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the TACT model (Topology-Aware Correlations between Relations) for inductive link prediction. It captures topological correlations between relations to improve reasoning on unseen entities in knowledge graphs.

tools.name: KGE-DURA
tools.one_line_profile: Duality-induced regularization for tensor factorization in knowledge graph completion
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the DURA (DUality-induced RegulArizer) method for tensor factorization-based knowledge graph completion. It addresses overfitting in models like CP and Tucker by exploiting the duality between model parameters.

tools.name: KGE-HAKE
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchy-aware knowledge graph embedding model for link prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of HAKE (Hierarchy-Aware Knowledge Graph Embedding), which maps entities into the polar coordinate system to model semantic hierarchies in knowledge graphs, distinguishing entities at different levels of the hierarchy.

tools.name: MTAD-GAT
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Attention Networks for multivariate time-series anomaly detection
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of MTAD-GAT, a model that uses graph attention networks to capture feature and temporal correlations for detecting anomalies in multivariate time-series data, applicable to industrial sensor data analysis.

tools.name: CommonsenseERL
tools.one_line_profile: Event representation learning enhanced with external commonsense knowledge
tools.detailed_description: Code for learning event representations by integrating external commonsense knowledge graphs. It improves event prediction and reasoning tasks by leveraging structured knowledge.

tools.name: SimplE
tools.one_line_profile: Simple and fully expressive embedding model for link prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of SimplE, a tensor factorization approach for knowledge graph embedding that allows for independent learning of head and tail entity embeddings, providing a fully expressive model for link prediction.

tools.name: R-GCN (RelationPrediction)
tools.one_line_profile: Relational Graph Convolutional Networks for link prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Relational Graph Convolutional Networks (R-GCNs), a fundamental GNN architecture specifically designed for handling multi-relational data in knowledge graphs for tasks like link prediction and entity classification.

tools.name: Relation_Extraction_KBE
tools.one_line_profile: C++ implementation of Knowledge Base Embedding models
tools.detailed_description: A C++ codebase for knowledge base embedding and relation extraction. It provides efficient implementations of embedding algorithms for processing large-scale knowledge graphs.

tools.name: KGen
tools.one_line_profile: Fortran kernel generator for extracting and optimizing scientific code
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed by NCAR to extract kernels from large Fortran applications (common in climate and weather modeling) into standalone, compilable units for optimization, testing, and verification.

tools.name: BGRL_Pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: Bootstrapped Graph Latents for self-supervised graph representation learning
tools.detailed_description: PyTorch implementation of BGRL (Bootstrapped Graph Latents), a self-supervised learning method for graphs that learns representations without requiring negative samples, suitable for large-scale graph analysis.

tools.name: GLBench
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive benchmark for evaluating Large Language Models on graph tasks
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite designed to evaluate the capabilities of Large Language Models (LLMs) in solving various graph-related tasks, facilitating the assessment of LLM-Graph integration strategies.

tools.name: CLEVR-Graph
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset and generator for graph-based reasoning tasks
tools.detailed_description: A dataset and generation tool for graph-based reasoning, derived from the CLEVR dataset. It provides structured graph representations of scenes to test the reasoning capabilities of graph neural networks.

tools.name: OpenBG-IMG
tools.one_line_profile: Baselines for multimodal product knowledge graph link prediction
tools.detailed_description: A collection of baseline models and tools for the CCKS 2022 task on link prediction in multimodal product knowledge graphs, integrating image and text data for KG completion.

tools.name: OpenBioLink
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark and evaluation framework for biomedical link prediction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive resource and evaluation framework specifically designed for link prediction on heterogeneous biomedical knowledge graphs. It includes high-quality datasets and standardized evaluation protocols.

tools.name: SAFRAN
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable rule application for link prediction in knowledge graphs
tools.detailed_description: An efficient C++ tool for applying non-redundant logical rules to predict links in large-scale knowledge graphs. It focuses on scalability and speed in rule-based reasoning.

tools.name: TopoNet
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based topology reasoning for autonomous driving scenes
tools.detailed_description: A graph neural network framework for reasoning about the topology of driving scenes (e.g., lane connectivity). It models road elements as graphs to infer structural relationships for autonomous navigation.

tools.name: OpenSPG-KAG
tools.one_line_profile: Logical form-guided reasoning and retrieval framework for knowledge bases
tools.detailed_description: A framework combining OpenSPG engine and LLMs to build logical reasoning and factual Q&A solutions. It addresses limitations of vector similarity by using logical forms to guide retrieval and reasoning on professional domain knowledge bases.

tools.name: MoSE
tools.one_line_profile: Modality split and ensemble for multimodal knowledge graph completion
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the MoSE framework for multimodal knowledge graph completion. It uses modality splitting and ensemble techniques to better integrate visual and textual information for link prediction.

tools.name: GAT
tools.one_line_profile: Original implementation of Graph Attention Networks
tools.detailed_description: The reference implementation of Graph Attention Networks (GAT), a pioneering GNN architecture that uses attention mechanisms to weigh the importance of neighboring nodes, widely used in scientific graph modeling.

tools.name: OPTransE
tools.one_line_profile: Ordered relation paths for knowledge graph completion
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of OPTransE, a knowledge graph embedding model that incorporates ordered relation paths to capture long-distance dependencies and composite relations for improved link prediction.

tools.name: Edgeformers
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-empowered transformers for textual-edge networks
tools.detailed_description: A framework that adapts Transformer architectures to handle textual-edge networks, integrating graph structural information with textual semantics for representation learning on edges.

tools.name: Graph-CoT
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Chain-of-Thought for augmenting LLM reasoning
tools.detailed_description: A method that augments Large Language Models with graph-based Chain-of-Thought reasoning. It enables LLMs to reason over graph structures step-by-step, improving performance on complex graph tasks.

tools.name: ProcrustEs-KGE
tools.one_line_profile: Closed-form orthogonal Procrustes analysis for efficient KGE
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a highly efficient knowledge graph embedding method using closed-form Orthogonal Procrustes Analysis. It offers significant speedups in training compared to gradient-based methods.

tools.name: Two-timescale-DGL-DDPG
tools.one_line_profile: DRL-based resource allocation for MEC systems
tools.detailed_description: A Deep Reinforcement Learning (DDPG) approach for joint service caching, communication, and computing resource allocation in Mobile Edge Computing (MEC) systems, utilizing graph-based state representation.

tools.name: OWL-RL
tools.one_line_profile: OWL2 RL profile implementation for RDFLib
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the OWL2 RL reasoning profile on top of RDFLib. It expands RDF graphs by applying OWL RL rules, enabling semantic reasoning and inference on knowledge graphs.

tools.name: KeAP
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge-enhanced protein representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A framework for protein representation learning that integrates knowledge from primary structure reasoning. It enhances protein embeddings by leveraging biological knowledge graphs and sequence information.

tools.name: NP-FKGC
tools.one_line_profile: Normalizing Flow-based Neural Process for few-shot KG completion
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a Normalizing Flow-based Neural Process model for few-shot knowledge graph completion. It addresses the challenge of predicting links for entities with limited data by modeling uncertainty and distribution.

tools.name: Graph-Constrained-Reasoning
tools.one_line_profile: Faithful reasoning on knowledge graphs with LLMs
tools.detailed_description: A framework for constraining Large Language Model reasoning using knowledge graphs to ensure faithfulness and reduce hallucinations. It forces the LLM to follow valid paths in the KG during inference.

tools.name: Reasoning-on-Graphs (RoG)
tools.one_line_profile: Faithful and interpretable LLM reasoning on graphs
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Reasoning on Graphs (RoG) framework, which synergizes LLMs and KGs for faithful and interpretable reasoning. It generates reasoning paths on KGs to answer questions.

tools.name: GNN-Explainer
tools.one_line_profile: Model-agnostic explainer for Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A tool for explaining the predictions of any Graph Neural Network. It identifies a compact subgraph and a small subset of node features that play a crucial role in the GNN's prediction.

tools.name: GHE-LPC
tools.one_line_profile: Distantly supervised relation extraction with hierarchy embeddings
tools.detailed_description: Code for relation extraction using Global Hierarchy Embeddings and Local Probability Constraints. It improves distantly supervised relation extraction by incorporating hierarchical information of relations.

tools.name: DGN
tools.one_line_profile: Directional Graph Networks implementation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Directional Graph Networks (DGN), which incorporate directional vector fields into GNNs to better model physical or geometric graphs where directionality is critical.

tools.name: PyG-Signed-Directed
tools.one_line_profile: Signed and directed graph neural network extension for PyTorch Geometric
tools.detailed_description: An extension library for PyTorch Geometric specifically designed for signed and directed networks. It provides data loaders, models, and utilities for analyzing graphs with positive/negative links and directionality.

tools.name: Jumping-Knowledge-Networks
tools.one_line_profile: Representation learning on graphs with Jumping Knowledge Networks
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Jumping Knowledge (JK) Networks, a GNN architecture that adaptively aggregates information from different neighborhood ranges for each node, improving representation learning on graphs with varying structures.

tools.name: BioKEEN
tools.one_line_profile: A computational library for learning and evaluating biological knowledge graph embeddings
tools.detailed_description: BioKEEN is a Python library designed for training and evaluating knowledge graph embedding models specifically on biological data. It integrates with PyKEEN and provides interfaces for biological databases.

tools.name: pykg2vec
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for knowledge graph embedding and representation learning
tools.detailed_description: pykg2vec is a comprehensive Python library for Knowledge Graph Embedding (KGE). It provides a unified framework for training, evaluating, and tuning various state-of-the-art KGE models.

tools.name: CogDL
tools.one_line_profile: A comprehensive library for graph deep learning
tools.detailed_description: CogDL is a graph deep learning toolkit that allows researchers and developers to easily train and evaluate GNN models. It covers tasks like node classification, link prediction, and graph classification.

tools.name: tsl
tools.one_line_profile: A PyTorch library for processing spatiotemporal data
tools.detailed_description: tsl (Torch Spatiotemporal) is a library designed to accelerate research in spatiotemporal data processing, with a focus on Graph Neural Networks for tasks like traffic forecasting and weather prediction.

tools.name: graphein
tools.one_line_profile: Protein graph library for converting protein structures into graphs
tools.detailed_description: Graphein is a Python library that provides functionality for constructing graph representations of biomolecules (like proteins) from PDB files, facilitating the use of GNNs in structural biology.

tools.name: SpectralEmbeddings
tools.one_line_profile: Python library to generate node embeddings from Knowledge Graphs using GCN kernels
tools.detailed_description: SpectralEmbeddings is a library for generating node embeddings from Knowledge Graphs using various Graph Convolutional Network (GCN) kernels and Graph Autoencoders, including VanillaGCN, ChebyshevGCN, and Spline GCN.

tools.name: pyHGT
tools.one_line_profile: Heterogeneous Graph Transformer implementation based on PyTorch Geometric
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the Heterogeneous Graph Transformer (HGT) model, designed to handle heterogeneous information networks (HINs) for tasks like node classification and link prediction in scientific knowledge graphs.

tools.name: kgeo
tools.one_line_profile: Analytic Kerr raytracing library for black hole physics
tools.detailed_description: A simple Python library for analytic raytracing in the Kerr metric, used for calculating geodesics and visualizing light paths around rotating black holes in astrophysics simulations.

tools.name: Graph-Learn
tools.one_line_profile: Industrial-scale Graph Neural Network framework
tools.detailed_description: An industrial graph neural network framework designed for large-scale graph training and inference, supporting distributed processing and integration with TensorFlow and PyTorch for complex network analysis.

tools.name: libgrape-lite
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel graph processing library based on GRAPE
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library for parallel graph processing, implementing the GRAPE model to handle large-scale graph analytics and algorithms efficiently.

tools.name: kged
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for Knowledge Graph Error Detection
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed to detect errors and inconsistencies within knowledge graphs, serving as a quality control utility for KG maintenance.

tools.name: KGT5
tools.one_line_profile: Sequence-to-Sequence Knowledge Graph Completion model
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the KGT5 model for knowledge graph completion and question answering, utilizing a sequence-to-sequence transformer architecture.

tools.name: DySAT
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic Graph Representation Learning with Self-Attention
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of DySAT (Dynamic Self-Attention Network), a model for learning node representations on dynamic graphs where structure and features evolve over time.

tools.name: DGL-KE
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance library for Knowledge Graph Embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A scalable and high-performance package built on Deep Graph Library (DGL) for training knowledge graph embedding models on large-scale datasets.

tools.name: DGL-LifeSci
tools.one_line_profile: GNN library for chemistry and biology
tools.detailed_description: A Python package based on DGL specifically designed for applying graph neural networks to tasks in chemistry and biology, such as molecular property prediction and drug discovery.

tools.name: RGAT
tools.one_line_profile: Relational Graph Attention Networks implementation
tools.detailed_description: TensorFlow implementation of Relational Graph Attention Networks (RGAT), used for reasoning over knowledge graphs by incorporating relation-specific attention mechanisms.

tools.name: SimplE
tools.one_line_profile: SimplE Embedding for Knowledge Graph Link Prediction
tools.detailed_description: PyTorch implementation of the SimplE model for knowledge graph embedding, providing a solver for link prediction tasks.

tools.name: APPNP
tools.one_line_profile: Predict then Propagate GNN implementation
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the APPNP (Approximate Personalized Propagation of Neural Predictions) model, combining GNNs with personalized PageRank for node classification.

tools.name: CapsGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Capsule Graph Neural Network implementation
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Capsule Graph Neural Networks (CapsGNN), applying capsule network concepts to graph structured data for classification tasks.

tools.name: ClusterGCN
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient GCN training algorithm implementation
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Cluster-GCN, an algorithm designed for efficient training of deep and large graph convolutional networks via graph clustering.

tools.name: GraphWaveletNeuralNetwork
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Wavelet Neural Network implementation
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Graph Wavelet Neural Networks (GWNN), utilizing graph wavelets for efficient spectral graph convolution.

tools.name: MixHop-and-N-GCN
tools.one_line_profile: MixHop GNN architecture implementation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of MixHop, a graph convolutional architecture that mixes powers of the adjacency matrix to capture higher-order neighborhood information.

tools.name: SimGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Graph Similarity Computation with GNNs
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of SimGNN, a neural network approach for efficient graph similarity computation and matching.

tools.name: PyTorch Geometric Temporal
tools.one_line_profile: Spatiotemporal Signal Processing with GNNs
tools.detailed_description: A temporal extension library for PyTorch Geometric, providing methods for spatiotemporal signal processing and dynamic graph representation learning.

tools.name: Bigraph
tools.one_line_profile: Bipartite network link prediction library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library specifically designed for link prediction tasks in bipartite networks, providing implementations of various projection-based and topology-based algorithms.

tools.name: Emgraph
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Knowledge Graph Representation Learning
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for knowledge graph embedding and representation learning, offering implementations of standard KGE models.

tools.name: pytorch-graphsage
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of GraphSAGE
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the GraphSAGE algorithm for inductive representation learning on large graphs.

tools.name: graph_attention_pool
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Attention Pooling implementation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of attention-based pooling mechanisms for Graph Neural Networks, enabling hierarchical representation learning.

tools.name: graph-cnn.pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: Graph CNN implementation in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Graph Convolutional Neural Networks, providing a baseline solver for graph classification tasks.

tools.name: ConMask
tools.one_line_profile: Open-world Knowledge Graph Completion model
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the ConMask model for open-world knowledge graph completion, designed to handle unseen entities via content masking.

tools.name: ProjE
tools.one_line_profile: Embedding Projection for KG Completion
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the ProjE model, a neural network architecture for knowledge graph completion that learns joint embeddings of entities and relations.

tools.name: city2graph
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to transform geospatial relations into graph representations for GNNs
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed to transform geospatial road network data into graph representations suitable for spatial network analysis and Graph Neural Networks (GNNs).

tools.name: KBGAN
tools.one_line_profile: Adversarial learning framework for Knowledge Graph Embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing adversarial learning techniques for training Knowledge Graph Embeddings (KGE), serving as a baseline and tool for KGE research.

tools.name: causalgraph
tools.one_line_profile: Package for modeling and visualizing causal graphs in KGs
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for modeling, persisting, and visualizing causal graphs that are embedded within knowledge graphs, facilitating causal inference tasks.

tools.name: EasyDGL
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Continuous-time Dynamic Graph Learning
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit designed to encode, train, and interpret continuous-time dynamic graph learning models, providing a simplified interface for dynamic GNNs.

tools.name: MultiTensor
tools.one_line_profile: Multilayer network tensor factorization tool
tools.detailed_description: A C++ tool for multilayer network tensor factorization, enabling community detection, link prediction, and measurement of layer interdependence in complex networks.

tools.name: Geometric GNN Dojo
tools.one_line_profile: Unified framework for exploring Geometric GNN designs
tools.detailed_description: A unified implementation and benchmarking framework (Dojo) to explore the design space of Geometric Graph Neural Networks, facilitating reproducible research.

tools.name: gRNAde
tools.one_line_profile: Generative AI framework for 3D RNA inverse design
tools.detailed_description: A generative AI framework (gRNAde) for the inverse design of 3D RNA structures and functions, utilizing geometric deep learning.

tools.name: graph-convnet-tsp
tools.one_line_profile: GCN-based solver for the Travelling Salesman Problem
tools.detailed_description: An efficient Graph Convolutional Network implementation designed to solve the Travelling Salesman Problem (TSP), serving as a neural combinatorial optimization tool.

tools.name: GCNII
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Simple and Deep Graph Convolutional Networks
tools.detailed_description: A widely used PyTorch implementation of the GCNII model, enabling deep graph convolutional networks with initial residual and identity mapping.

tools.name: ggnn.pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of Gated Graph Sequence Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A reusable PyTorch implementation of Gated Graph Sequence Neural Networks (GGNN), often used as a component in larger graph learning systems.

tools.name: FCGF
tools.one_line_profile: Fully Convolutional Geometric Features for 3D registration
tools.detailed_description: A library for extracting fast and accurate 3D geometric features using fully convolutional networks, used for 3D registration and correspondence tasks.

tools.name: HetGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Heterogeneous Graph Neural Network implementation
tools.detailed_description: A standard implementation of HetGNN (Heterogeneous Graph Neural Network), widely used as a baseline and tool for heterogeneous graph representation learning.

tools.name: GNN-RAG
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Retrieval for LLM Reasoning
tools.detailed_description: A framework combining Graph Neural Networks (GNN) with Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) to enhance Large Language Model reasoning over knowledge graphs.

tools.name: MAGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Metapath Aggregated Graph Neural Network
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of MAGNN, a model for heterogeneous graph embedding that aggregates information via metapaths, serving as a key tool for heterogeneous graph analysis.

tools.name: GDN
tools.one_line_profile: GNN-based Anomaly Detection in Multivariate Time Series
tools.detailed_description: A tool for detecting anomalies in multivariate time series data using Graph Neural Networks, applicable to sensor networks and physical system monitoring.

tools.name: Graph-Transformer
tools.one_line_profile: Universal Graph Transformer Self-Attention Networks
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive implementation of Graph Transformer networks, providing a versatile tool for applying self-attention mechanisms to graph data.

tools.name: keras-gat
tools.one_line_profile: Keras implementation of Graph Attention Networks
tools.detailed_description: A reusable Keras implementation of Graph Attention Networks (GAT), facilitating the integration of attention mechanisms into graph-based workflows.

tools.name: Spektral
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Networks library for Keras and Tensorflow 2
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python library for Graph Neural Networks, built on Keras and TensorFlow 2, offering a wide range of layers and utilities for graph deep learning.

tools.name: DGLL
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed Graph Learning Library for scalable GNN training
tools.detailed_description: A distributed graph learning library designed to handle large-scale graph data and train Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) efficiently across multiple computing nodes.

tools.name: GNNLens2
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visualization tool for Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A visualization tool designed to help researchers and developers understand and debug Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) by visualizing graph structures, node embeddings, and model predictions.

tools.name: DGL
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Graph Library for deep learning on graphs
tools.detailed_description: A Python package built to ease deep learning on graphs, on top of existing DL frameworks like PyTorch, TensorFlow, and MXNet. It provides efficient primitives for message passing and graph operations.

tools.name: gvp-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric Vector Perceptrons for biomolecular structure learning
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing Geometric Vector Perceptrons (GVP), a rotation-equivariant Graph Neural Network architecture specifically designed for learning from 3D biomolecular structures (protein engineering/design).

tools.name: DGLD
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Graph Outlier Detection Library
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for deep graph outlier detection, providing unified interfaces for various anomaly detection algorithms on graphs, built upon DGL.

tools.name: DRKG
tools.one_line_profile: Drug Repurposing Knowledge Graph and analysis tools
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive biological knowledge graph relating genes, compounds, diseases, and other biological entities, accompanied by tools and pre-trained models for drug repurposing analysis.

tools.name: jraph
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Network library in JAX
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight, functional library for building Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) in JAX, providing data structures and utilities for graph operations and model definitions.

tools.name: Graph4NLP
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Graph Neural Networks in NLP
tools.detailed_description: A library designed to facilitate the use of Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) for Natural Language Processing (NLP) tasks, supporting graph construction, representation learning, and prediction workflows.

tools.name: distributed-kge-poplar
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed Knowledge Graph Embedding system for IPUs
tools.detailed_description: A system for training and evaluating knowledge graph embedding models, optimized for distributed execution on Graphcore IPUs (Intelligence Processing Units).

tools.name: benchmarking-gnns
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking infrastructure for Graph Neural Networks across various tasks
tools.detailed_description: A library designed to facilitate the benchmarking of Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) by providing standard datasets, data loading pipelines, and evaluation metrics. It aims to ensure fair and reproducible comparisons between different GNN architectures.

tools.name: Gunrock
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance programmable GPU graph analytics library
tools.detailed_description: A CUDA library for graph-processing designed specifically for the GPU. It uses a high-level, bulk-synchronous, data-centric abstraction focused on operations on vertex or edge frontiers, enabling efficient implementation of graph algorithms.

tools.name: INDRA
tools.one_line_profile: Automated model assembly system for biological causal graphs
tools.detailed_description: Integrated Network and Dynamical Reasoning Assembler (INDRA) is a tool that collects knowledge from natural language processing systems and databases to assemble causal graphs and dynamical models, primarily for systems biology.

tools.name: bijou
tools.one_line_profile: Training and tuning framework for PyTorch GNN models
tools.detailed_description: A fastai-like framework designed to simplify the training, tuning, and probing of PyTorch models, specifically compatible with graph neural network libraries like pytorch_geometric and DGL.

tools.name: MatDGL
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library for crystal modeling and materials science
tools.detailed_description: A neural network package built to allow researchers to train custom models for crystal modeling tasks, aiming to accelerate research and applications in material science.

tools.name: CogDL-TensorFlow
tools.one_line_profile: TensorFlow implementation of the CogDL graph representation learning toolkit
tools.detailed_description: The TensorFlow version of CogDL, a toolkit for deep learning on graphs. It provides implementations of various graph neural network algorithms and embedding methods.

tools.name: dl-benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for deep learning inference engines
tools.detailed_description: A tool for benchmarking deep learning inference performance across various frameworks (OpenVINO, TensorFlow, PyTorch, etc.), useful for optimizing scientific model deployment.

tools.name: CogKGE
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit and benchmark for knowledge graph embedding
tools.detailed_description: A knowledge graph embedding toolkit and benchmark designed for representing multi-source and heterogeneous knowledge, facilitating research in knowledge graph completion and analysis.

tools.name: scGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural network tool for single-cell RNA-seq analysis
tools.detailed_description: scGNN (single cell graph neural networks) is a tool for single cell clustering and imputation using graph neural networks, providing a hypothesis-free deep learning framework for scRNA-seq data.

tools.name: En-transformer
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of E(n)-Equivariant Transformer for 3D graph data
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the E(n)-Transformer, which extends E(n)-Equivariant Graph Neural Networks with attention mechanisms. This tool is essential for modeling 3D scientific data such as molecules and proteins where rotation and translation equivariance are critical.

tools.name: Adjacent Attention Network
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based message passing layer for Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch library implementing a Graph Neural Network architecture that reframes message passing as a Transformer with local attention. It serves as a building block for graph inference tasks in scientific domains.

tools.name: EGNN-PyTorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of E(n)-Equivariant Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A widely used library implementing E(n)-Equivariant Graph Neural Networks (EGNN). It provides rotation, translation, and reflection equivariant layers, making it a standard tool for deep learning on 3D molecular structures and particle physics data.

tools.name: Geometric Vector Perceptron
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant neural network layers for large biomolecule learning
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Geometric Vector Perceptron (GVP), designed for learning representations of large biomolecules like proteins. It handles 3D rotation equivariance efficiently, enabling tasks such as protein design and structure analysis.

tools.name: PNA
tools.one_line_profile: Principal Neighbourhood Aggregation layers for Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing Principal Neighbourhood Aggregation (PNA) for Graph Neural Networks in PyTorch, DGL, and PyTorch Geometric. PNA is a powerful aggregation strategy often used in molecular graph learning to capture structural properties better than standard aggregators.

tools.name: MTAD-GAT
tools.one_line_profile: Multivariate time-series anomaly detection using Graph Attention Networks
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the MTAD-GAT model which utilizes graph attention networks to detect anomalies in multivariate time-series data, applicable in sensor networks and system monitoring.

tools.name: FastGCN
tools.one_line_profile: Fast learning algorithm for Graph Convolutional Networks via importance sampling
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing FastGCN, an improvement over standard GCNs that uses importance sampling to reduce the computational cost of training on large graphs.

tools.name: cnn_graph
tools.one_line_profile: Spectral Graph Convolutional Neural Networks (ChebNet)
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Convolutional Neural Networks on Graphs with Fast Localized Spectral Filtering (ChebNet), a foundational method for graph signal processing and learning.

tools.name: ML-GCN
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-label image recognition using Graph Convolutional Networks
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of ML-GCN which captures label dependencies using GCNs to improve multi-label image classification performance.

tools.name: Subgraph Sketching
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable subgraph-based link prediction for Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: Code for 'Graph Neural Networks for Link Prediction with Subgraph Sketching', providing efficient methods for link prediction tasks in large knowledge graphs.

tools.name: DRAGON
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Bidirectional Language-Knowledge Graph Pretraining
tools.detailed_description: A pretraining framework that integrates text and knowledge graphs to enhance language models with structured knowledge reasoning capabilities.

tools.name: HittER
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical Transformers for Knowledge Graph Embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A model for learning knowledge graph embeddings using hierarchical transformers, capable of capturing complex structural patterns in KGs.

tools.name: StemGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Spectral Temporal Graph Neural Network for time-series forecasting
tools.detailed_description: A graph neural network model designed for multivariate time-series forecasting that captures both temporal and inter-series correlations in the spectral domain.

tools.name: GGNN Samples
tools.one_line_profile: Reference implementation for Gated Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: Sample code and reference implementation for Gated Graph Neural Networks (GGNN), widely used for tasks involving graph-structured data and sequence learning on graphs.

tools.name: ptgnn
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch Graph Neural Network Library
tools.detailed_description: A library for building and training Graph Neural Networks in PyTorch, focusing on applications in program analysis and other structured data tasks.

tools.name: tf-gnn-samples
tools.one_line_profile: TensorFlow implementations of various Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Graph Neural Network implementations in TensorFlow, serving as a resource for researchers and practitioners to apply GNNs.

tools.name: tf2-gnn
tools.one_line_profile: TensorFlow 2 library for Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing Graph Neural Networks using TensorFlow 2, providing reusable components for building GNN models.

tools.name: Decagon
tools.one_line_profile: Modeling polypharmacy side effects with Graph Convolutional Networks
tools.detailed_description: A method for predicting side effects of drug pairs (polypharmacy) using multi-relational graph convolutional neural networks on multimodal graphs.

tools.name: OhmNet
tools.one_line_profile: Representation learning in multi-layer tissue-specific graphs
tools.detailed_description: An algorithm for learning node representations in multi-layer graphs, specifically designed for modeling tissue-specific protein interaction networks.

tools.name: GraphLLM
tools.one_line_profile: Boosting graph reasoning ability of Large Language Models
tools.detailed_description: A framework to enhance the reasoning capabilities of Large Language Models on graph-structured data, bridging the gap between LLMs and GNNs.

tools.name: Holographic Embeddings (HolE)
tools.one_line_profile: Holographic Embeddings of Knowledge Graphs
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of HolE, a compositional vector space model for knowledge graph embeddings that uses circular correlation to create holographic representations.

tools.name: scikit-kge
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for computing knowledge graph embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing implementations of various knowledge graph embedding algorithms, designed with a scikit-learn compatible interface.

tools.name: JKNet-dgl
tools.one_line_profile: DGL implementation of Jumping Knowledge Networks
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Jumping Knowledge Networks (JK-Nets) using the Deep Graph Library (DGL), allowing GNNs to adaptively leverage different neighborhood ranges.

tools.name: Robust Matching Network
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric transformation estimation for remote sensing imagery
tools.detailed_description: A robust matching network designed to estimate geometric transformations in remote sensing imagery, useful for image registration and analysis in earth sciences.

tools.name: LinkPrediction
tools.one_line_profile: Weisfeiler-Lehman Neural Machine for Link Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Weisfeiler-Lehman Neural Machine (WLNM) for link prediction in graphs, a method leveraging subgraph structural features.

tools.name: SEAL
tools.one_line_profile: Link prediction based on Subgraphs, Embeddings, and Attributes
tools.detailed_description: SEAL is a framework for link prediction that learns heuristics from local subgraphs using Graph Neural Networks, achieving state-of-the-art performance.

tools.name: MTransE
tools.one_line_profile: Multilingual Knowledge Graph Embeddings for Cross-lingual Alignment
tools.detailed_description: A model for cross-lingual knowledge alignment that learns multilingual knowledge graph embeddings, facilitating knowledge transfer across languages.

tools.name: gnn-powerflow
tools.one_line_profile: GNN application for predicting AC Power Flow
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network application developed with PyTorch Geometric to predict AC power flow calculations in electrical power systems.

tools.name: gnn_hierarchical_pooling
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical Graph Representation Learning with Differentiable Pooling
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of hierarchical pooling mechanisms for Graph Neural Networks, enabling the learning of hierarchical graph representations.

tools.name: NCATS ADME
tools.one_line_profile: Prediction models for ADME properties
tools.detailed_description: Source code for the ADME@NCATS application, hosting prediction models for Absorption, Distribution, Metabolism, and Excretion properties of chemical compounds.

tools.name: CAKE
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable Commonsense-Aware Framework for Multi-View KG Completion
tools.detailed_description: A framework for knowledge graph completion that integrates commonsense knowledge and multi-view learning to improve scalability and accuracy.

tools.name: GANA-FewShotKGC
tools.one_line_profile: Gated and Attentive Neighbor Aggregator for Few-Shot KG Completion
tools.detailed_description: A model for few-shot knowledge graph completion that uses a gated and attentive neighbor aggregator to learn from limited data.

tools.name: LCGE
tools.one_line_profile: Logic and Commonsense-Guided Temporal Knowledge Graph Completion
tools.detailed_description: A method for temporal knowledge graph completion that incorporates logic rules and commonsense knowledge to guide the learning process.

tools.name: RPJE
tools.one_line_profile: Rule-Guided Compositional Representation Learning on Knowledge Graphs
tools.detailed_description: A representation learning approach for knowledge graphs that uses rules to guide the composition of embeddings, enhancing interpretability and performance.

tools.name: BootEA
tools.one_line_profile: Bootstrapping Entity Alignment with Knowledge Graph Embedding
tools.detailed_description: An iterative bootstrapping approach for entity alignment in knowledge graphs, using embeddings to align entities across different KGs.

tools.name: DIFT
tools.one_line_profile: Finetuning Generative LLMs for Knowledge Graph Completion
tools.detailed_description: A method for finetuning generative Large Language Models with discrimination instructions to perform knowledge graph completion tasks.

tools.name: FedLU
tools.one_line_profile: Heterogeneous Federated Knowledge Graph Embedding Learning and Unlearning
tools.detailed_description: A federated learning framework for knowledge graph embeddings that supports both learning and unlearning in heterogeneous environments.

tools.name: MultiKE
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-view Knowledge Graph Embedding for Entity Alignment
tools.detailed_description: A multi-view embedding approach for entity alignment that combines different views (e.g., name, structure, attributes) to improve alignment accuracy.

tools.name: OpenEA
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking library for Embedding-based Entity Alignment
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmarking library for embedding-based entity alignment techniques, providing datasets and implementations of state-of-the-art models.

tools.name: muKG
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Multi-source Knowledge Graph Embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A library designed for multi-source knowledge graph embeddings and applications, facilitating the integration and analysis of knowledge from multiple sources.

tools.name: GraphCMR
tools.one_line_profile: Convolutional Mesh Regression for Human Shape Reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: A method for reconstructing 3D human shapes from single images using a Graph Convolutional Network attached to a mesh structure.

tools.name: kgextension
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge Graph Extension for Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that extends standard data analysis workflows with knowledge graph capabilities, making it easier to integrate KG features into ML pipelines.

tools.name: OpenNARS
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source implementation of the Non-Axiomatic Reasoning System (NARS) for AGI research
tools.detailed_description: A general-purpose AI reasoning system designed for research in Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) and cognitive science. It implements a non-axiomatic logic framework to handle uncertainty and insufficient knowledge.

tools.name: Visualkeras
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization library for Keras neural network architectures
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that generates layered or graph-style visualizations of Keras/TensorFlow neural network architectures, aiding researchers in model inspection and documentation.

tools.name: PyTorch Geometric (PyG)
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Network library for PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A library built upon PyTorch to easily write and train Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) for a wide range of applications related to structured data, including geometric deep learning.

tools.name: PyKEEN
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for learning and evaluating knowledge graph embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for training and evaluating knowledge graph embedding models, offering a unified pipeline for dataset loading, model training, and evaluation.

tools.name: linkpred
tools.one_line_profile: Library for link prediction in graphs
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for performing link prediction on graphs, providing implementations of various topological predictors and evaluation metrics.

tools.name: GraFOG
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Data Augmentation Library for PyTorch Geometric
tools.detailed_description: A library designed to perform data augmentation on graph datasets, compatible with PyTorch Geometric, to enhance the robustness and performance of GNN models.

tools.name: KGen
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for generating knowledge graphs from unstructured text
tools.detailed_description: A utility to extract entities and relationships from unstructured text data and construct knowledge graphs, facilitating the conversion of textual data into structured knowledge.

tools.name: GNN-FakeNews
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking framework for GNN-based fake news detection
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Graph Neural Network models and datasets specifically designed for the task of fake news detection, serving as a benchmark framework for social network analysis research.

tools.name: GTrick
tools.one_line_profile: Library of tricks for Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A library that implements various 'tricks' and optimization techniques for Graph Neural Networks to improve model performance and training stability.

tools.name: unKR
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Uncertain Knowledge Graph Reasoning
tools.detailed_description: A Python library dedicated to reasoning on Uncertain Knowledge Graphs (UKGs), providing implementations of various models to handle uncertainty in graph data.

tools.name: GNN Benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for evaluating Graph Neural Network models
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed to evaluate and compare different Graph Neural Network models on semi-supervised node classification tasks, ensuring fair and consistent benchmarking.

tools.name: XNM-Net
tools.one_line_profile: Explainable and explicit visual reasoning model over scene graphs
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the XNM-Net model for visual reasoning tasks. It utilizes scene graphs to perform explainable and explicit reasoning, bridging computer vision and knowledge graph domains.

tools.name: gae-dgl
tools.one_line_profile: DGL implementation of Graph Autoencoder (GAE)
tools.detailed_description: A reimplementation of the Graph Autoencoder (GAE) and Variational Graph Autoencoder (VGAE) models using the Deep Graph Library (DGL). It serves as a tool for unsupervised learning on graph data.

tools.name: ad_examples
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive collection of anomaly detection methods and algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A library providing implementations of various anomaly detection methods, including point-based, graph-based, and time-series approaches. It includes active learning, Bayesian rule-mining, and adversarial attacks with Graph Convolutional Networks.

tools.name: SGMN
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-structured referring expressions reasoning model
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the SGMN model for reasoning over graph-structured referring expressions in the wild. It applies graph neural networks to solve visual grounding and reasoning tasks.

tools.name: GraphGym
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for designing and evaluating Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive platform developed by Stanford for designing, implementing, and evaluating Graph Neural Networks (GNNs). It simplifies the process of creating GNN pipelines and benchmarking performance.

tools.name: GreaseLM
tools.one_line_profile: Graph reasoning enhanced language models for QA
tools.detailed_description: A model that integrates graph reasoning with language models to improve performance on question answering tasks. It fuses representations from pre-trained LMs and GNNs over knowledge graphs.

tools.name: KGReasoning
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for multi-hop logical reasoning in knowledge graphs
tools.detailed_description: A library and framework for performing multi-hop logical reasoning over knowledge graphs. It supports complex query answering tasks using graph embeddings and neural reasoning methods.

tools.name: pretrain-gnns
tools.one_line_profile: Strategies and tools for pre-training Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A repository providing strategies and implementations for pre-training Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) to improve transfer learning on graph tasks. It includes methods for self-supervised learning on graphs.

tools.name: RelBench
tools.one_line_profile: Relational Deep Learning Benchmark
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite for relational deep learning, providing datasets and evaluation tools for machine learning tasks on relational databases and knowledge graphs.

tools.name: ATISE
tools.one_line_profile: Temporal Knowledge Graph completion with Gaussian embedding
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of ATISE and TeRo models for temporal knowledge graph completion. It uses time-series Gaussian embeddings and temporal rotation to model evolving knowledge graphs.

tools.name: TeLM
tools.one_line_profile: Linear Temporal Regularizer and Multivector Embeddings for TKG
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the TeLM model for Temporal Knowledge Graph Completion. It utilizes a linear temporal regularizer and multivector embeddings to perform link prediction in temporal settings.

tools.name: cnn-lstm-link-prediction
tools.one_line_profile: Path-based link prediction model using CNN and LSTM
tools.detailed_description: A Keras implementation of a path-based link prediction model for knowledge graph completion, combining CNN and LSTM to process graph paths.

tools.name: Knowledge Graph of Thoughts
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for AI assistants using Knowledge Graph of Thoughts
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the 'Knowledge Graph of Thoughts' (KoT) approach, which structures the reasoning process of AI assistants as a knowledge graph to improve performance and affordability.

tools.name: InfoGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised graph-level representation learning via mutual information
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of InfoGraph, a method for unsupervised and semi-supervised graph-level representation learning that maximizes mutual information between graph-level and substructure-level representations.

tools.name: graph-based-nn
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of Graph Convolutional Network implementations
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing implementations of Graph Convolutional Networks (GCNs). Given its high star count, it serves as a reference library for GNN models.

tools.name: RKGE
tools.one_line_profile: Recurrent Knowledge Graph Embedding framework
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Recurrent Knowledge Graph Embedding (RKGE) framework, designed for recommendation systems leveraging knowledge graph paths.

tools.name: GATGNN
tools.one_line_profile: GNN with global attention for materials property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Graph Convolutional Neural Networks with Global Attention (GATGNN), specifically designed for predicting properties of materials.

tools.name: kg-reeval
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation framework for Knowledge Graph Completion methods
tools.detailed_description: Codebase for the re-evaluation of Knowledge Graph Completion methods, providing a standardized environment to benchmark and assess the performance of various KGE models.

tools.name: MedType
tools.one_line_profile: Medical Entity Linking with Semantic Type Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for improving Medical Entity Linking by incorporating Semantic Type Prediction. It leverages graph-based methods to disambiguate and link medical entities.

tools.name: LinChemIn
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for processing Linked Chemical Information and reaction data
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit for processing Linked Chemical Information. It leverages the connectivity of chemical reaction data to provide insights and interfaces with synthesis prediction tools.

tools.name: Kingdon
tools.one_line_profile: Symbolically optimized Geometric Algebra library
tools.detailed_description: A Geometric Algebra library for Python that supports symbolic optimization and is compatible with PyTorch, NumPy, and SymPy. It is useful for physics simulations and geometric deep learning.

tools.name: pytorch_HAN
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of Heterogeneous Graph Attention Network
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the Heterogeneous Graph Attention Network (HAN) using PyTorch. It allows for attention-based learning on heterogeneous graphs containing different types of nodes and edges.

tools.name: GCMC
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Convolutional Matrix Completion implementation
tools.detailed_description: Re-implementation of the Graph Convolutional Matrix Completion (GCMC) model using PyTorch and PyTorch Geometric. It is used for recommendation and link prediction tasks.

tools.name: lightning-geometric
tools.one_line_profile: Integration library for PyTorch Geometric and PyTorch Lightning
tools.detailed_description: A library designed to integrate PyTorch Geometric with PyTorch Lightning, facilitating the training and scaling of Graph Neural Networks.

tools.name: how_attentive_are_gats
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis tools for Graph Attention Networks
tools.detailed_description: Code and tools for analyzing the attention mechanisms in Graph Attention Networks (GATs), as presented in the ICLR 2022 paper. It helps in understanding the interpretability of GATs.

tools.name: EAGRNet
tools.one_line_profile: Edge-aware Graph Representation Learning for Face Parsing
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of EAGRNet, a model for face parsing that utilizes edge-aware graph representation learning and reasoning.

tools.name: TensorFlow GNN
tools.one_line_profile: Library to build Graph Neural Networks on TensorFlow
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for building and training Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) within the TensorFlow ecosystem. It provides primitives for handling graph data and implementing GNN layers.

tools.name: torch-geometric-pool
tools.one_line_profile: Pooling layers library for PyTorch Geometric
tools.detailed_description: A specialized library providing various pooling layers and operations for Graph Neural Networks, designed to work with PyTorch Geometric.

tools.name: JointGT
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-Text Joint Representation Learning model
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of JointGT, a model for learning joint representations of graphs and text, specifically for text generation tasks from knowledge graphs.

tools.name: SentiLARE
tools.one_line_profile: Sentiment-Aware Language Representation Learning
tools.detailed_description: A library for sentiment-aware language representation learning that incorporates linguistic knowledge (including Part-of-Speech and sentiment polarity) into pre-trained models.

tools.name: CKRL
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge Representation Learning with Confidence
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a knowledge representation learning method that incorporates confidence information into knowledge graph embeddings to handle noisy data.

tools.name: DKRL
tools.one_line_profile: Representation learning of knowledge graphs with entity descriptions
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the DKRL model (Description-embodied Knowledge Representation Learning) which utilizes entity descriptions for better knowledge graph embeddings, particularly for zero-shot scenarios.

tools.name: Fast-TransX
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient implementation of TransE and extended KGE models
tools.detailed_description: A highly efficient C++ implementation of translation-based knowledge graph embedding models (TransE, TransH, TransR, TransD) designed for speed and scalability.

tools.name: GEAR
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based Evidence Aggregating and Reasoning for fact verification
tools.detailed_description: A tool implementing a graph-based evidence aggregating and reasoning framework for fact verification, enabling multi-hop reasoning over evidence graphs.

tools.name: IKRL
tools.one_line_profile: Image-embodied Knowledge Representation Learning
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the IKRL model which incorporates visual information (images) into knowledge graph representations to improve entity embeddings.

tools.name: KB2E
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of Knowledge Graph Embedding models (TransE, TransH, TransR, PTransE)
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive C++ library implementing various translational distance models for knowledge graph embedding, serving as a baseline toolkit for KGE research.

tools.name: KR-EAR
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge Representation Learning with Entities, Attributes and Relations
tools.detailed_description: A tool for learning knowledge representations by jointly modeling entities, relations, and attributes, distinguishing between relational and attribute triples.

tools.name: KernelGAT
tools.one_line_profile: Fine-grained Fact Verification with Kernel Graph Attention Network
tools.detailed_description: A graph attention network based tool for fine-grained fact verification, utilizing kernel-based attention mechanisms to aggregate evidence.

tools.name: OpenKE
tools.one_line_profile: An Open-Source Package for Knowledge Embedding
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive and efficient framework for knowledge graph embedding, supporting various models (TransE, ComplEx, RotatE, etc.) and training strategies on both CPU and GPU.

tools.name: TKRL
tools.one_line_profile: Representation Learning of Knowledge Graphs with Hierarchical Types
tools.detailed_description: A tool for knowledge graph embedding that incorporates hierarchical entity type information to improve representation quality.

tools.name: TensorFlow-TransX
tools.one_line_profile: TensorFlow implementation of TransE and extended KGE models
tools.detailed_description: A TensorFlow-based library for training and evaluating translation-based knowledge graph embedding models.

tools.name: DeepPBS
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning of protein–DNA binding specificity
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning tool for predicting protein-DNA binding specificity from structural data, utilizing graph neural networks.

tools.name: GCN
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Graph Convolutional Networks in TensorFlow
tools.detailed_description: The original reference implementation of Graph Convolutional Networks (GCN) for semi-supervised classification on graph-structured data.

tools.name: keras-gcn
tools.one_line_profile: Keras implementation of Graph Convolutional Networks
tools.detailed_description: A Keras-based library for implementing Graph Convolutional Networks, facilitating easy integration into Keras workflows.

tools.name: pygcn
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Convolutional Networks in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Graph Convolutional Networks, widely used as a baseline and building block for GNN research.

tools.name: relational-gcn
tools.one_line_profile: Relational Graph Convolutional Networks (R-GCN)
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Relational Graph Convolutional Networks, designed specifically for modeling relational data and knowledge graphs.

tools.name: CompGCN-DGL
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of CompGCN in Pytorch and DGL
tools.detailed_description: A DGL-based implementation of Composition-based Multi-Relational Graph Convolutional Networks (CompGCN) for knowledge graph embedding.

tools.name: TorchKGE
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge Graph embedding in Python and PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for knowledge graph embedding relying on PyTorch, providing efficient implementations of various KGE models and evaluation metrics.

tools.name: AnalyzeKGE
tools.one_line_profile: Analyzing knowledge graph embedding methods
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for analyzing and comparing various knowledge graph embedding methods including TransE, DistMult, and others.

tools.name: MEIM-KGE
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-partition Embedding Interaction for KGE
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the MEIM model and other KGE baselines (RotatE, ComplEx, etc.) for efficient and expressive link prediction.

tools.name: CoDEx
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge graph Completion Datasets Extracted from Wikidata and Wikipedia
tools.detailed_description: A set of high-quality knowledge graph completion datasets extracted from Wikidata and Wikipedia, serving as benchmarks for KGE models.

tools.name: Traffic-Benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark and Solution for Traffic Prediction with Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite and solution implementation for traffic prediction using Dynamic Graph Convolutional Recurrent Networks, applicable to urban science and complex systems modeling.

tools.name: complex
tools.one_line_profile: Complex Embeddings for Simple Link Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Source code for Complex Embeddings (ComplEx), a state-of-the-art model for knowledge graph completion using complex-valued embeddings.

tools.name: cgcnn
tools.one_line_profile: Crystal graph convolutional neural networks for predicting material properties
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning tool that uses graph convolutional neural networks to predict material properties directly from the crystal structure.

tools.name: GraphTrans
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Networks with Global Attention
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Graph Transformer, a GNN variant that captures long-range context using global attention mechanisms.

tools.name: low-rank-logic
tools.one_line_profile: Injecting Logical Background Knowledge into Embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A tool for relation extraction that combines matrix factorization with logical background knowledge to improve embedding quality.

tools.name: LibKGE
tools.one_line_profile: A knowledge graph embedding library for reproducible research
tools.detailed_description: A highly configurable PyTorch-based library for training, evaluating, and hyperparameter optimizing knowledge graph embedding models.

tools.name: UrbanKGent
tools.one_line_profile: Urban knowledge graph construction agent
tools.detailed_description: An agent-based tool for constructing urban knowledge graphs, facilitating the modeling of complex urban systems.

tools.name: Keras-DGL
tools.one_line_profile: Keras Deep Learning on Graphs
tools.detailed_description: A library providing Keras layers for deep learning on graphs, enabling easy implementation of GNNs within the Keras framework.

tools.name: torchlensmaker
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable geometric optics in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A tool for designing optical systems using differentiable geometric optics and optimization in PyTorch.

tools.name: GNN-LSPE
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Networks with Learnable Structural and Positional Representations
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of GNNs that explicitly learn structural and positional encodings to improve graph representation power.

tools.name: datasets_knowledge_embedding
tools.one_line_profile: Datasets for Knowledge Graph Completion with textual information
tools.detailed_description: A collection of datasets for knowledge graph completion tasks, enriched with textual descriptions for entities.

tools.name: JMAC
tools.one_line_profile: Joint Multilingual Knowledge Graph Completion and Alignment
tools.detailed_description: A tool for jointly performing knowledge graph completion and alignment across multiple languages.

tools.name: graph-representation-learning
tools.one_line_profile: Autoencoders for Link Prediction and Semi-Supervised Node Classification
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of autoencoder-based methods for graph representation learning, focusing on link prediction and node classification.

tools.name: nebula-dgl
tools.one_line_profile: Integration package connecting NebulaGraph database with Deep Graph Library (DGL)
tools.detailed_description: A library that facilitates the use of NebulaGraph as a data backend for Graph Neural Networks trained with DGL, enabling efficient graph sampling and inference on large-scale scientific knowledge graphs.

tools.name: Graphiler
tools.one_line_profile: Compiler stack for optimizing Graph Neural Network execution
tools.detailed_description: A compiler stack built on top of DGL and TorchScript that compiles GNNs defined using user-defined functions (UDFs) into efficient execution plans, accelerating inference and training for graph-based scientific models.

tools.name: NeuralKG
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source library for knowledge graph representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python library for knowledge graph representation learning (KGRL) that implements various methods including conventional KGEs, GNN-based models, and Transformer-based models. It provides a unified framework for training, evaluation, and hyperparameter tuning on standard datasets, supporting scientific knowledge discovery tasks.
